name: Escape Cave (LilAfricaaa)
description:
You were exploring the mountains and about 12 fully grown bears confronted you without attacking bringing you to their cave which is full of more than 100 bears. Your goal is to sprint through the cave escaping the bears, when you eventually escape the bears you win by going out of the door of the cave but if you die during the attempt you start from the beginning. When you escape the cave it will reward you with music. If you then restart your game you can try and beat your score

Use Arrow Keys to move left and right and Space Bar to jump.
